history.proof: intros H. sauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 1 branch or a conjunctive pattern made of 0 patterns.

original: intros H. destruct H as [H | H]. - left. symmetry. apply Nat.mul_cancel_r with (p:=p). + intro. apply H. + apply H. - right. apply Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg in H; auto.
